description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Hyper-V remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-20700):

1. Review the affected build numbers for your Windows installation:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3007
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.3930
   - Additional builds for Windows 10 and Windows 11 are listed in the release notes.

2. Download and install the relevant KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5034123.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5034122.

**Details**:
- These updates address the critical vulnerability, which could allow remote code execution on the affected systems. 
- Ensure proper backup of your data before proceeding with the installation of the updates to prevent any data loss.
- For more details, please refer to the following update package links:
   - [KB5034121](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
   - [KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - [KB5034122](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
   - [KB5034129](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034129)
   - [KB5034130](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130)
